entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
